events.start: which osascript > /dev/null && osascript -e 'display notification "App started" with title "nodemon"'
events.restart: which osascript > /dev/null && osascript -e 'display notification "App restarted" with title "nodemon"'
events.crash: which osascript > /dev/null && osascript -e 'display notification "App crashed" with title "nodemon"'
